when i put in the new hard drive, and installed ubuntu on it, i just wrote grub over ntldr
and for some reason grub would crap out
error 21
and i fiddled with some bios settings and rearranged the jumpers on the hard drives until they worked
and now i get the grub menu, and everything works fine
i'm not sure what the hubbub about a lack of gui installer is...i thought this install was a lot easier than fedora core
yeah, it was ridiculously easy....it just did everything for me
i just had to tell it to install on my other hard drive
yeah error21 usually means it cant find the partition, usually  you just haveto point it to the right partition
the thing about this graphical installer is that it works on 11 architectures
